title: ObserverTest.TestMultipleNetBase intermittently segfaults
body_html:
Log:

14:13:08 [ RUN      ] ObserverTest.TestMultipleNetBase
14:13:08 I0703 14:13:08.134001   604 net_dag_utils.cc:102] Operator graph pruning prior to chain compute took: 1.919e-06 secs
14:13:08 I0703 14:13:08.135370   604 net_async_base.cc:430] Using estimated CPU pool size: 4; NUMA node id: -1
14:13:08 I0703 14:13:08.135377   604 net_async_base.cc:440] Created new CPU pool, size: 4; NUMA node id: -1
14:13:08 ./.jenkins/caffe2/test.sh: line 60:   604 Segmentation fault      (core dumped) "$test" --gtest_output=xml:"$gtest_reports_dir/$(basename $test).xml"

Sample: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/caffe2-builds/job/py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-test/7333/console
